comments.body: While we are here: many of `toolbar` actions (`FastForwardParentToMatchCurrentBranchAction`, `PullCurrentBranchFastForwardOnlyAction`, `ResetCurrentBranchToRemoteAction`, `SlideInBranchBelowCurrentBranchAction`, `SlideOutCurrentBranchAction`) seems to be unused, so probably should be deleted.
But ok, maybe it's more reasonable to delete (or not) this actions on PR #484
Yeah, I've already brought this up with @mkondratek, let's see which of the current-branch actions actually survive #484
